title: Wiwo
author: Wiwo
content: Bitcoin talk is the most popular Bitcoin online memory and data bank, it serves as a blockchain-first digital hub for both analysts and researchers. Some members here came to the know about this forum through Google search and other knowledge base quests, but the most important thing is that we are all here and history have made this forum unique with a large number of members here that have first-hand knowledge since its inception of Bitcoin and bitcointalk even Satoshi Nakamoto is a member of this Noble forum after creating the forum. This thread is created as a reminder to everyone that, this forum is noble enough and every legitimate member needs to take the best shot. In the future you will witness that you started on a good note and you are privileged to add to the general understanding of Bitcoin, blockchain and the forum and I most say bitcointalk is the best cryptocurrency social media with first-hand information guided by rules and regulation that help shape the general perspective and actions of every member.

comments.author: KingsDen
comments.body: Apart from being the oldest and arguably the most popular bitcoin or cryptocurrency forum, bitcointalk has passed the test of continuity. The legacies of the heroes pass are being passed on and sustained in this forum.  That is why I am always careful of the contributions I make today, because posterity will look back at today in as much as bitcoin will remain alive. I derive so much joy reading posts from Satoshi and the old developers. I look at their contributions and try to imagine how smart they were. Tbh, they were very smart. But some were smarter. Then, I give it to them all, and some of them are still with us here.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Apart from bitcointalk forum. Is there any other crypto currency forum like bitcointalk? Bitcointalk forum is unarguable is the best forum ever. The information I have seen and gotten are legit and accurate. No social media platform can provide these kind information for it users. And bitcointalk is going to beat any other social media in the internet soon. just a matter of time.

It's a very good forum with very good information, but look at what the average user does in the bounties section, for example. Or the shitposters.
